issue.title: Removed non-default call of `$app-get()` in favor of using `$app->has()`

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
| Q             | A
| ------------- | ---
| Is bugfix?    | no
| New feature?  | no
| Breaks BC?    | no
| Tests pass?   | yes

This is a small code quality improvement. Related to #14184

body: @lynicidn It is definitely not a duplicate, though it is related.
Checking parent container makes sense to me. `$throwException` should be discussed/addressed separately.

issue.title: Modules support servicelocator tree traversal. (#14184)

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
| Q             | A
| ------------- | ---
| Is bugfix?    | no
| New feature?  | yes
| Breaks BC?    | no
| Tests pass?   | maybe
| Fixed issues  | #14184

body:
> `$throwException` should be discussed/addressed separately.

Regardless of what is decided there, it won't be in 2.x right? Since it breaks BC?
In that case I'll leave it for now.

@dynasource @klimov-paul feel free to weigh in before there is a PR next time.
If I make an issue, it is marked ready for adoption and you don't take the time to respond you are wasting my time.

we are doing our best to look at many topics as possible. In this case you relied on one opinion, so that is a risk. Especially because PR's require at least 3 approvals of core members to be adopted.

Please don't hesitate to call for more core members opinions before creating a PR.
My bad, I assumed the label ready for adoption meant ready for adoption :|

issue.title: The module should not use $_GET

repository.name: yii2-grid
repository.description: Enhanced GridView with various utilities for Yii Framework 2.0

issue.body:
In `GridView::init()`:
````
...
$this->_isShowAll = ArrayHelper::getValue($_GET, $this->_toggleDataKey, $this->defaultPagination) === 'all';

````

This should be replaced with:
````
$this->_module->get('request')->getQueryParam($this->_toggleDataKey, $this->defaultPagination);
````
Note that Yii recently added tree traversal for modules, this code requires that tree traversal.
Tree traversal was added in https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/pull/14350
